beer.beer_description:
You should feel him coming from quite some distance. His huge shadow enveloping everything around, your bones starting to shiver, pints starting to quiver on your table.

And then you see his immense stature, his bushy, roughly brushed moustache, his big, burly arms with tacky prison tattoos that really aren’t just a fashion statement.

You’ve definitely heard gruesome, violent stories about him.

But don’t be afraid, Pith’s chosen to turn over a new leaf. He pushed aside his fury just to indulge in sweet chocolate bars and fresh, zesty oranges.

A fresh, healthy start!

Just don’t call him “fat”. Trust us. Maybe just… Chunky.

Please?

Please?

Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 95 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 20!

user.bio: “Everything else can wait but the search for God cannot wait and love one another” – George Harrison

items.badge_description: Wouldn’t it be nice if milk stouts came directly from beer producing cows? While this unfortunately isn’t the case (yet) they do have a full body and sweetness due to a larger amount of lactose and sugars. That's 70 different beers with the style of Milk / Sweet Stout. Try 5 more for Level 15!

items.checkin_comment: Тройной коллаб румын и валийцев. Это, как минимум, необычно. Накинул за это 0,5

beer.beer_description:
You should feel him coming from quite some distance. His huge shadow enveloping everything around, your bones starting to shiver, pints starting to quiver on your table.

And then you see his immense stature, his bushy, roughly brushed moustache, his big, burly arms with tacky prison tattoos that really aren’t just a fashion statement.

You’ve definitely heard gruesome, violent stories about him.

But don’t be afraid, Pith’s chosen to turn over a new leaf. He pushed aside his fury just to indulge in sweet chocolate bars and fresh, zesty oranges.

A fresh, healthy start!

Just don’t call him “fat”. Trust us. Maybe just… Chunky.

Please?
